examples.example: 我每天都会认真完成工作日报，这让我的工作更加有条理。

translate.english: I will carefully complete the work daily report every day, which makes my work more organized.

examples.example: 他每天坚持写日报来总结当天的工作成果和经验。

translate.english: He insists on writing a daily report every day to summarize the work achievements and experiences of the day.

examples.example: 我养成了写日报的好习惯，它帮助我更好地回顾和规划每天的工作与生活。

translate.english: I have developed a good habit of writing a daily report, which helps me better review and plan my daily work and life.
